item.title: My top 10 favorite Marvel movies till date
item.description: Well, I have seen every Marvel movie atleast five to six times. Hence, choosing my top 10 Marvel movies is definitely not going to be an easy job ðŸ˜…. So then let’s start in descending order, 10. Ant Man 9. Guardians of the Galaxy 8. Thor - Dark World 7. Captain America: The Winter Soldier 6. Iron Man 2 5. Captain Marvel 4. Doctor Strange 3. Avengers - Infinity War 2.
